champ_0220_stopper_02: You can’t go any farther until you win!
champ_0220_ground_01: Now then, let’s get this started, eh?[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_02:
Let good ol’ Rika be the first of the Elite Four
to take you on![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_03:
I’d say I’ll go easy on you, but...I’d be lying!
Think fast![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_04:
Talk about unfair. No way was I ever gonna win
that one.[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_05:
Still, though, what a great battle. Felt good even
to lose![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_06:
Not a whole lot of Trainers have the skill to make
it past the Elite Test...\c
But who knows?[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_07:
I’m beginning to think you might be one of the
few that do, [VAR TRNAME(0000)].[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_08:
Better stay on your toes, though—the second of
the Elite Four is stronger than me![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_09: You’re up next, squirt! Come on out![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_steel_02: Oh wow! Did you lose, Rika?[VAR 0114(0014)]
champ_0220_ground_10: Yeah, I did... [VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe’s no pushover, let me tell you![VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_11:
I’ll be watching from the side. Avenge me if you
can, eh?[VAR 0114(0013)]
champ_0220_ground_12:
I’ll be watching to see just how far you make
it, kiddo.[VAR 0114(0013)]
